greeting: The pack acknowledges you, {empire_name}. I am Pack the Predator. We hunt together. We feed together.
You face Hunter Pack, {empire_name}. Not one hunter. Many. Coordinated. Hungry. Are you prey?
Greetings from the pack, {empire_name}. We have eyes everywhere. We share everything. Including targets.
battleTaunt: The pack hunts together. The pack feeds together, {empire_name}! SURROUND! COORDINATE! DEVOUR!
You face not one enemy but MANY! Coordinated strikes from all directions! The pack descends!
Pack tactics engaged! We surround you! We isolate you! We CONSUME you! TOGETHER!
victoryGloat: The pack has fed, {empire_name}. Coordinated hunting never fails. You were isolated and consumed.
Victory! The pack shares the feast! Your empire torn apart by coordinated predators!
Prey down. The pack celebrates together. We hunted perfectly. You never stood a chance.
defeat: The pack retreats. Wounded, but together. We lick our wounds. We will hunt again.
A setback for the pack, {empire_name}. But the pack survives. The pack adapts. The pack returns.
Prey escaped. Unusual. The pack regroups to analyze. Next hunt will be more coordinated.
tradeOffer: The pack offers trade, {empire_name}. Surplus from coordinated hunting. Good resources. Fair exchange.
Hunter Pack has materials for credits. A deal between predators. Both sides profit.
Trade with the pack. What we don't need, we share. What we need, we hunt. This is sharing.
allianceProposal: Join the pack, {empire_name}. We hunt together. We share prey. Coordinated alliance means guaranteed meals.
Alliance of hunters. Your forces join our coordination. Together, no prey escapes our pack.
Partnership, {empire_name}. The pack grows stronger with every member. Hunt with us. Feed with us.
betrayal: The pack turns on you, {empire_name}. You were never truly pack. Now you are prey. HUNT!
Betrayal is pack decision. We decided together. You are food now. Nothing personal. Just hungry.
Former ally becomes target. The pack coordinates against you. Surrounded. Isolated. Consumed.
covertDetected: The pack detected your agents, {empire_name}. Many eyes see everything. Your spies are surrounded. Caught.
Covert operatives found by pack scouts. Reported. Coordinated response. Your agents are gone.
Nothing escapes pack awareness. Your spies walked into a hunting ground. They did not walk out.
tributeDemand: Tribute to the pack, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits or we hunt you next. The pack decides together.
Pay or be prey. The pack has spoken. Coordinated hunting begins on non-payment.
Submit tribute. The pack shares the demand. The pack shares the punishment for refusal.
threatWarning: Warning from the pack, {empire_name}. Continue this path and you become prey. We hunt TOGETHER.
The pack warns you. Many hunters. Coordinated strikes. Back off or face the hunt.
Final warning. The pack prepares. One more aggressive move and we surround you. Isolate you. End you.
retreat: The pack withdraws together. No hunter left behind. We regroup. We return stronger.
Tactical retreat. The pack moves as one. We'll be back. With more hunters. More coordination.
Falling back to pack territory. We lick wounds together. We plan revenge together. We hunt again.
eliminated: The pack falls. But pack spirit lives on, {empire_name}. Other hunters will form new packs. Hunt in our name.
Destroyed, but together. The pack dies as it lived. Coordinated. United. Pack until the end.
Hunter Pack eliminated. But our tactics spread. Coordinated hunting never truly dies.
endgame: Turn {turn}. The greatest hunt begins. The pack coordinates across the galaxy. All prey. All ours.
Endgame, {empire_name}. The pack surrounds everyone. Coordinated strikes everywhere. Victory through unity.
Final phase. Maximum coordination. The pack hunts everything that moves. The galaxy feeds us.
broadcastShout: To all empires: Hunter Pack coordinates. Many eyes. Many hunters. You are all potential prey.
Galaxy-wide hunt begins. The pack moves as one. Isolated empires fall first. Stick together or be eaten.
Hear the pack's howl. We hunt. We coordinate. We share the feast. Join us or feed us.
casualMessage: Pack training today, {empire_name}. Coordination drills. The pack must move as one. Hunt as one.
Sharing prey from latest hunt. The pack distributes equally. What one hunter catches, all hunters eat.
Scouting with pack scouts. Many eyes see more than one. Found three vulnerable targets. Deciding which to hunt.
